scenes.description: Shirakami Fubuki, Natsuiro Matsuri, and Akai Haato perform 'Cyber Piapia Great Declaration'.
Audience cheers and a transition between songs as the stage is cleared and set for the next performance.
Tokino Sora, AZKi, Sakura Miko, and Roboco-san perform the hololive theme song 'Shiny Smily Story'.

subtitles.original: こりに　こりに　こりに　こりに...
subtitles.english: Korini korini korini korini...

subtitles.original: 私のため日々日々お仕事励んでくれてありがとう
subtitles.english: Thanks for working hard at your job every day for my sake

subtitles.original: もしもしも愛しい
subtitles.english: If, if I am beloved

subtitles.original: 絶対絶対絶対...
subtitles.english: Absolutely, absolutely, absolutely...

subtitles.original: お願いね
subtitles.english: Please

subtitles.original: このこのこのこの
subtitles.english: This, this, this, this

subtitles.original: うっ！このこのこのこの
subtitles.english: Ugh! This, this, this, this

subtitles.original: このこのこのこの
subtitles.english: This, this, this, this

subtitles.original: 銀河の果てまで推してほしい
subtitles.english: I want you to support me to the ends of the galaxy

subtitles.original: 同じ未来を見ていたい
subtitles.english: I want to see the same future

subtitles.original: あの夢手にしたい
subtitles.english: I want to grasp that dream

subtitles.original: それぞれ違った心で
subtitles.english: With our different hearts

subtitles.original: 走り出そう
subtitles.english: Let's start running

subtitles.original:
Shiny Smily Story
作詞：金丸佳史 (onetrap)
作曲・編曲：中野領太 (onetrap)
subtitles.english:
Shiny Smily Story
Lyrics: Yoshifumi Kanamaru (onetrap)
Composition/Arrangement: Ryota Nakano (onetrap)

subtitles.original: どこ見ても真っ暗な場所に芽生えていた
subtitles.english: It budded in a place where everything was pitch black

subtitles.original: ほんの小さな希望にこの瞳奪われた
subtitles.english: My eyes were captivated by a tiny speck of hope

subtitles.original: 不安で揺れる心をうまくチューニングして
subtitles.english: Tuning my heart that wavers with anxiety

subtitles.original: ほんの小さな勇気を振り絞っていたんだよ
subtitles.english: I was squeezing out a tiny bit of courage

subtitles.original: あきらめの文字手放して進む
subtitles.english: Letting go of the word "surrender" as I move forward

subtitles.original: 苦しい時も　もう私は一人じゃないから
subtitles.english: Because even in painful times, I'm not alone anymore

subtitles.original: だからこそ夢追いかけたい
subtitles.english: That's why I want to chase my dreams

subtitles.original: ワクワク止まらない
subtitles.english: The excitement won't stop

subtitles.original: 想像超えていく世界見せてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll show you a world that exceeds your imagination

subtitles.original: アクセスしてみたい
subtitles.english: I want to try accessing it

subtitles.original: 後悔なんてさせない
subtitles.english: I won't let you have any regrets

subtitles.original: それぞれ違った心で走り出そう
subtitles.english: Let's start running with our different hearts

subtitles.original: 空想の空に輝く眩しい想いは
subtitles.english: The dazzling feelings shining in the imaginary sky

subtitles.original: 見たことのない光をリアルに届けるよ
subtitles.english: Will deliver a light you've never seen to reality

subtitles.original: いつも聞こえるエールはここにキャプチャーして
subtitles.english: Capturing the cheers I always hear right here

subtitles.original: また新しい光を探したくなるよ
subtitles.english: It makes me want to search for new light again

subtitles.original: 君の笑顔は綻びて進む
subtitles.english: Your smile blooms as we advance

subtitles.original: 悲しい時に見返すよ　力が沸くから
subtitles.english: I'll look back at it when I'm sad, because it gives me strength

subtitles.original: 胸を張って夢追いかけたい
subtitles.english: I want to chase my dreams with pride

subtitles.original: 奇跡のストーリー一緒に作ろう
subtitles.english: Let's create a miracle story together

subtitles.original: 終わらない夢を　誰一人欠かさない
subtitles.english: An unending dream, without missing a single person

subtitles.original: 曖昧なこの世界
subtitles.english: In this vague world

subtitles.original: それぞれ違った心で彩れ
subtitles.english: Paint it with our different hearts

subtitles.original: 楽しい時も
subtitles.english: In happy times

subtitles.original: 寂しい時も
subtitles.english: In lonely times

subtitles.original: 信じ合えるものがある
subtitles.english: There's something we can believe in together

subtitles.original: 結び目にこの鼓動鳴らし続けたい
subtitles.english: I want to keep this heartbeat sounding at the knot

subtitles.original: モノクロな世界に溢れ出すよ　絵具たち
subtitles.english: The paints are overflowing into the monochrome world

subtitles.original: 憧れの舞台立ちたい
subtitles.english: I want to stand on the stage I admire

subtitles.original: 真っ直ぐ輝きたい
subtitles.english: I want to shine straightforwardly

subtitles.original: 時に涙してまた笑い合いたい
subtitles.english: Sometimes crying, and wanting to laugh together again

subtitles.original: 同じ未来を見ていたい
subtitles.english: I want to see the same future

subtitles.original: あの夢手にしたい
subtitles.english: I want to grasp that dream

subtitles.original: 踏み出そう奇跡の一歩を
subtitles.english: Let's take a miracle step forward

subtitles.original: 息切らして夢追いかけたい
subtitles.english: Out of breath, I want to chase my dreams

subtitles.original: ワクワク止まらない
subtitles.english: The excitement won't stop

subtitles.original: 想像超えていく世界見せてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll show you a world that exceeds your imagination

subtitles.original: アクセスしてみな
subtitles.english: Try accessing it

subtitles.original: 後悔なんてここにない
subtitles.english: There are no regrets here

subtitles.original: それぞれ違った心でつくろう
subtitles.english: Let's create it with our different hearts
